description: This file defines an authentication context for a React frontend application, including user role management, login/logout functionality, and context provider setup.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Simulates user login by generating a fake token and storing user info in local storage.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user by clearing user info from state and local storage.

methods.name: switchRole
methods.description: Changes the role of the current user and updates local storage accordingly.

methods.name: useAuth
methods.description: Custom hook to access authentication context, ensuring it's used within an AuthProvider.
